SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[CoreFormsTabs] ( [CoreFormsTabs_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [CoreForms_Ky] int NULL , [CoreFormsTabs_Title] varchar(MAX) NULL , [CoreFormsTabs_Icon] varchar(MAX) NULL , [CoreFormsTabs_Order] int NULL , [CoreFormsTabs_UserInsert] int NULL , [CoreFormsTabs_UserUpdate] int NULL , [CoreFormsTabs_UserDelete] int NULL , [CoreFormsTabs_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [CoreFormsTabs_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [CoreFormsTabs_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[CoreFormsTabs] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_CoreFormsTabs PRIMARY KEY ([CoreFormsTabs_Ky])
